page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT. (Local Garage).
page.content: The{garage}nearest to the school is at{N.Skelton.}It is an agency for {French cars,}and it also{services}and {repairs}cars of all makes. It{sells second-hand cars,}and usually has a stock of up to 25. It also sells{small commercial vehicles and{motor-cycles(second-hand) are avilable. It has a van for {self-drive hire.}This costs about Â£15 a day. The garage{employs about 20 people, but some of these work only on a{part-time}basis. In the{past}it has been an agency for{Austin Rover,}and more recently, {Peugot. The garage also sells{Trans-cats, a type of 4 wheel-drive vehicle for use on the land.
